hero_section.title: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
hero_section.tagline: 10% Vitamin C serum for Oily, Combination skin.
key_highlights: Suitable for Oily, Combination skin types.
Helps brighten skin and fade dark spots.

benefits_section.headline: Benefits
bullets: Helps brighten the look of your skin.
Helps fade the appearance of dark spots over time.

usage_section.headline: How to use
steps: Apply 2-3 drops in the morning before sunscreen.
usage_section.frequency_note: Use once daily in the morning.

safety_section.headline: Safety & side effects
notes: May cause mild tingling for sensitive skin.
safety_section.sensitive_skin_warning: Patch test first if your skin tends to be sensitive.

faqs.question: How should I apply GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.answer: Apply 2-3 drops in the morning before sunscreen.

faqs.question: How often can I use GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.answer: You can use it once daily, preferably in the morning as described.

faqs.question: Should I use GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum in the morning or at night?
faqs.answer: The usage instructions specify morning use before sunscreen.
